title: Show HN: Cuq – Formal Verification of Rust GPU Kernels
summary:
Cuq is a new framework that formally verifies Rust GPU kernels by translating Rust's Mid-level Intermediate Representation (MIR) into Coq and connecting it to the existing Coq formalization of the PTX memory model. This bridges a gap between Rust's safety guarantees and the formally defined execution model of NVIDIA's PTX, addressing the lack of formal semantics for Rust GPU code.

The project defines a mechanized operational semantics for a subset of MIR suitable for GPU kernels, focusing on memory-model soundness, proving that MIR atomic and synchronization operations compile soundly to PTX instructions. The technical approach involves defining a Coq formalization of MIR, translating MIR to Coq using a custom tool, and connecting it to the existing PTX semantics formalization.

Expected outcomes include a Coq formalization of Rust MIR semantics, a MIR→PTX memory-model correspondence theorem, a prototype translator, and case studies on standard CUDA benchmarks. Future work includes incorporating Rust's ownership and lifetime reasoning. The project's impact lies in establishing a formal bridge between Rust's compiler infrastructure and the mechanized model of GPU execution, paving the way for verified compilation of GPU code and ownership-aware safety proofs. A demo is provided to showcase the translation and verification process. The current limitations include focusing on global memory, a curated MIR subset, and simplified floating-point handling.
chinese_title: Show HN: Cuq – Rust GPU内核的形式化验证
chinese_summary:
Cuq是一个新的框架，它通过将Rust的中级中间表示（MIR）翻译成Coq，并将其连接到现有的PTX内存模型的Coq形式化，来正式验证Rust GPU内核。这弥合了Rust的安全性保证与NVIDIA的PTX的形式化定义的执行模型之间的差距，解决了Rust GPU代码缺乏形式语义的问题。

该项目为适用于GPU内核的MIR子集定义了一个机械化的操作语义，重点关注内存模型健全性，证明MIR原子和同步操作可以健全地编译为PTX指令。技术方法包括定义MIR的Coq形式化，使用自定义工具将MIR翻译为Coq，并将其连接到现有的PTX语义形式化。

预期成果包括Rust MIR语义的Coq形式化、MIR→PTX内存模型对应定理、原型转换器以及对标准CUDA基准的案例研究。未来的工作包括整合Rust的所有权和生命周期推理。该项目的影响在于建立Rust编译器基础设施与GPU执行的机械化模型之间的正式桥梁，为GPU代码的验证编译和所有权感知的安全性证明铺平道路。提供了一个演示来展示翻译和验证过程。目前的局限性包括侧重于全局内存、精选的MIR子集和简化的浮点处理。

title: Greg Newby, CEO of Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation, has died
summary:
Dr. Gregory B. Newby, CEO of the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation for over 20 years, has passed away after a brief battle with cancer. He was also a voting member of the Distributed Proofreaders Foundation board and a close collaborator with Distributed Proofreaders.

Newby, originally from Canada but raised in the US, returned to Canada to work for the government in the Yukon Territory while continuing his leadership of Project Gutenberg. He was passionate about Project Gutenberg's mission of making literature accessible, recalling his excitement upon receiving an emailed copy of "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland" in 1987. He emphasized that his work at Gutenberg had a positive impact getting literature into people's hands.

Under his leadership, Project Gutenberg's ebook collection grew to over 75,000 titles, many produced with the help of Distributed Proofreaders. In 2023, he collaborated with Microsoft and MIT to create the Project Gutenberg Open Audiobook Collection of AI-narrated audiobooks, which was recognized by TIME magazine as one of the best inventions of the year. His vision and tireless leadership will be greatly missed by the Distributed Proofreaders community and beyond.
chinese_title: 古登堡计划文学档案馆基金会 CEO 格雷格·纽比去世
chinese_summary:
古登堡计划文学档案馆基金会首席执行官格雷戈里·B·纽比博士，在与癌症短暂斗争后逝世，他担任该职位超过20年。他同时也是分布式校对者基金会董事会的投票成员，并与分布式校对者保持着密切合作。

纽比，原籍加拿大，但在美国长大，之后返回加拿大在育空地区政府工作，同时继续领导古登堡计划。他热衷于古登堡计划让文学作品易于获取的使命，回忆起1987年收到《爱丽丝梦游仙境》电子邮件副本时的兴奋之情。他强调，他在古登堡计划的工作对将文学作品送到人们手中产生了积极影响。

在他的领导下，古登堡计划的电子书藏书增长到超过75,000册，其中许多都是在分布式校对者的帮助下制作的。2023年，他与微软和麻省理工学院合作创建了古登堡计划人工智能叙述有声读物开放馆藏，该馆藏被《时代》杂志评为年度最佳发明之一。分布式校对者社区及其他人士将深切缅怀他的远见卓识和不知疲倦的领导。

title: I see a future in jj
summary:
In this blog post dated October 22, 2025, Steve Klabnik, a prominent figure in the Rust programming language community, explains his decision to get involved with "jj," a new version control system (VCS) written in Rust. He draws parallels between jj's potential and his early assessment of Rust's future success.

Klabnik highlights that, similar to Rust's emergence in a space dominated by C and C++, jj offers a compelling alternative to Git, especially because it can be incrementally adopted within Git repositories. He emphasizes that jj has a strong market fit, a solid team led by Martin (the creator of jj), and a growing user base. He points to Google's internal adoption of jj as significant social proof, noting its use in both small individual projects and large monorepos.

While acknowledging a learning curve for experienced Git users, Klabnik believes jj is user-friendly for newcomers and fosters a passionate community. He also stresses that jj is used in Piper as the backend and that it can show the social proof needed for others to give it a chance.

The blog post culminates in Klabnik announcing his departure from Oxide to join ERSC, a new company building a developer collaboration platform on top of jj. He expresses his excitement to dedicate more time to the jj community, contribute to the platform's development, and create more tutorials. He sees a bright future for jj, mirroring the success he witnessed with Rust.
chinese_title: 我在jj看到了未来。
chinese_summary:
在2025年10月22日的这篇博文中，Rust编程语言社区的知名人物Steve Klabnik解释了他参与“jj”（一个用Rust编写的新版本控制系统）的决定。他将jj的潜力与他早期对Rust未来成功的评估进行了类比。

Klabnik强调，与Rust在C和C++主导的领域中崛起类似，jj为Git提供了一个引人注目的替代方案，尤其因为它可以在Git仓库中逐步采用。他强调jj具有强大的市场契合度、由Martin（jj的创建者）领导的强大团队以及不断增长的用户群。他指出谷歌在内部采用jj是一个重要的社会证明，并指出它被用于小型个人项目和大型单体仓库。

虽然承认有经验的Git用户需要一个学习曲线，但Klabnik认为jj对新手来说是友好的，并且培养了一个充满激情的社区。他还强调jj被用作Piper的后端，并且可以展示其他用户尝试所需的社会证明。

这篇博文的最后，Klabnik宣布他将离开Oxide加入ERSC，一家在jj之上构建开发者协作平台的新公司。他表达了他很高兴能花更多时间在jj社区，为平台的开发做出贡献，并创建更多的教程。他看到了jj光明的未来，正如他见证Rust的成功一样。

title: Willow quantum chip demonstrates verifiable quantum advantage on hardware
summary:
Google's Quantum AI team announced that their "Willow" quantum chip has achieved a significant breakthrough: demonstrating verifiable quantum advantage on hardware for the first time. Their "Quantum Echoes" algorithm, published in Nature, runs 13,000 times faster than the best classical algorithm on a supercomputer. This algorithm can be used to learn about the structure of systems from molecules to black holes.

The "Quantum Echoes" algorithm is a form of verifiable quantum advantage because the result can be repeated on other comparable quantum computers to achieve the same outcome. The algorithm works by sending a signal into the quantum system, perturbing a qubit, then reversing the signal to listen for an "echo" amplified by quantum interference.

In a separate, related experiment, they used the "Quantum Echoes" algorithm as a "molecular ruler" to measure longer distances in molecules via NMR. This experiment successfully measured the geometry of molecules with 15 and 28 atoms. The results matched traditional NMR and revealed new data, which validates the approach.

This breakthrough is an important step towards real-world applications of quantum computing in fields like medicine and materials science, specifically for modeling quantum mechanical phenomena, such as molecular structure. This could significantly impact drug discovery and the characterization of new materials. The team is now focused on achieving Milestone 3 on their quantum hardware roadmap: a long-lived logical qubit.
chinese_title: 柳树量子芯片展示了硬件上可验证的量子优势
chinese_summary:
谷歌量子AI团队宣布，他们的“柳树”（Willow）量子芯片取得重大突破：首次在硬件上演示了可验证的量子优势。 他们发表在《自然》杂志上的“量子回声”（Quantum Echoes）算法，比超算上最好的经典算法快13000倍。 该算法可用于了解从分子到黑洞的系统结构。

“量子回声”算法是一种可验证的量子优势，因为该结果可以在其他类似的量子计算机上重复，以获得相同的结果。 该算法的工作原理是向量子系统发送信号，扰动一个量子比特，然后反转信号，监听由量子干涉放大的“回声”。

在另一项相关的实验中，他们使用“量子回声”算法作为“分子标尺”，通过核磁共振（NMR）测量分子中更长的距离。 该实验成功测量了15和28个原子分子的几何结构。 结果与传统核磁共振一致，并揭示了新数据，验证了该方法的有效性。

这项突破是量子计算在医药和材料科学等领域的实际应用的重要一步，特别是对于模拟量子力学现象，例如分子结构。 这可能会显著影响药物发现和新材料的表征。 该团队现在专注于实现量子硬件路线图上的第三个里程碑：一个长寿命的逻辑量子比特。

title: HP SitePrint
summary:
HP SitePrint is a construction layout robot designed to automate and improve the efficiency and accuracy of construction site layouts and floor deviation marking. It combines HP's printing and robotics expertise to accelerate projects, reduce errors, and improve on-site productivity.

Key features and benefits include:

*   **Increased Efficiency:** Autonomous technology reduces layout costs and saves time, freeing up skilled labor for value-added tasks. It boasts up to 10x productivity gains.
*   **Enhanced Accuracy:** Precise implementation of complex layouts and floor levelness is ensured with high accuracy down to +/- 3/32 inch (+/- 2mm EMEA versions) for layout and +/- 1/32 inch (+/-0.8mm EMEA versions) for floor deviation marking, when using the SMR prism and a 1" Total Station.
*   **Ease of Use:** The all-in-one solution is portable and easy to manage. Users can prepare CAD files, perform site preparation, set up the solution with Robotic Total Stations, and execute jobs via a user interface.
*   **Floor Deviation Marking:** HP SitePrint automates the process of floor deviation marking, saving time, enhancing communication, and streamlining construction processes.
*   **Value Pack 3.0:** Includes a Robot Upgrade Kit with improved navigation speed, refined obstacle avoidance, real-time route adjustments, and enhanced uninterrupted operation.
*   **Cloud Management:** HP SitePrint cloud allows sharing of CAD files, monitoring job progress, and managing accounting reports.
*   **Compatibility:** HP partners with positioning industry leaders like Leica, Topcon, and Trimble to ensure compatibility with various Robotic Total Stations.
*   **Pay-as-you-go Model:** A usage-based pricing structure includes support, repairs, software, and firmware updates.
*   **Customer Success:** Case studies demonstrate significant cost reductions and productivity improvements in various construction scenarios.

HP SitePrint is a solution that delivers improved efficiency, accuracy, and overall productivity for construction layout processes.
chinese_title:
HP SitePrint

*   **客户成功案例：** 案例研究表明，在各种施工场景中，成本显著降低，生产力显著提高。

HP SitePrint 是一款可提高建筑放样过程效率、精度和整体生产力的解决方案。

title: LibCube: Find new sounds from audio synths easier
summary:
LibCube is a C++ DLL that uses machine learning to simplify sound design with audio synthesizers. It tackles the problem of synthesizers having too many parameters by reducing them to a manageable two or three. This allows users to more easily search for new and interesting sounds within a complex parameter space.

The library takes synthesizer preset values as input and employs algorithms like t-SNE to map the high-dimensional parameter space into a lower-dimensional one containing "good sounds." The provided `test_cube_c_api.cpp` demonstrates how to use the C API (defined in `cube_interface.h`) with the `cube_param.dll`. Compilation instructions are included for both Linux (using `compile.sh`) and Windows (using `compile.bat` with MSYS2 MINGW or Visual C++).

While the library leverages multi-core CPUs for efficient computation, the parameter reconstruction process, which uses neural networks, is computationally intensive and doesn't support real-time automation in DAWs. Users can change parameters and play the instrument offline.

The author, Tomas Ukkonen, provides examples of sounds found using LibCube and a YouTube video demonstrating its use with the commercial Sylent1 VST2 synthesizer. Feedback is welcomed at tomas.ukkonen@iki.fi, though extensive support may not be available. The library is licensed in a way that allows commercial usage.
chinese_title: LibCube：更轻松地发现音频合成器中的新音色
chinese_summary:
LibCube 是一个 C++ DLL，它利用机器学习来简化音频合成器的声音设计。它通过将合成器过多的参数减少到易于管理的两到三个来解决参数过多的问题。这使得用户更容易在复杂的参数空间中搜索新的和有趣的声音。

该库以合成器预设值为输入，并采用 t-SNE 等算法将高维参数空间映射到包含“好声音”的低维空间中。提供的 `test_cube_c_api.cpp` 演示了如何使用 C API（在 `cube_interface.h` 中定义）以及 `cube_param.dll`。包含了 Linux（使用 `compile.sh`）和 Windows（使用带有 MSYS2 MINGW 或 Visual C++ 的 `compile.bat`）的编译说明。

虽然该库利用多核 CPU 进行高效计算，但使用神经网络的参数重建过程计算密集型，并且不支持 DAW 中的实时自动化。用户可以更改参数并离线播放乐器。

作者 Tomas Ukkonen 提供了使用 LibCube 找到的声音示例和一个演示其与商业 Sylent1 VST2 合成器一起使用的 YouTube 视频。欢迎通过 tomas.ukkonen@iki.fi 提供反馈，但可能无法提供广泛的支持。该库的许可方式允许商业使用。

title: Cryptographic Issues in Cloudflare's Circl FourQ Implementation (CVE-2025-8556)
summary:
This article details cryptographic vulnerabilities (CVE-2025-8556) discovered in Cloudflare's CIRCL library, specifically its implementation of the FourQ elliptic curve. The vulnerabilities center around insufficient validation of points used in Diffie-Hellman key exchange, potentially leading to "invalid point attacks."

The article explains that without proper validation, an attacker can provide an invalid point that belongs to a curve with a smooth subgroup order. This makes it easier to brute-force the server's secret key using the Chinese Remainder Theorem. While Edwards curves are less susceptible to standard invalid curve attacks, a specific degenerate curve attack is possible by using points of the form (0, y).

The reported issues include:

*   **Incorrect point validation in Point.Unmarshal:** Failing to re-validate after conjugating the x-value.
*   **Faulty point comparison in pointR1.isEqual:** Returning true when Z is zero, an invalid projected coordinate.
*   **Lack of point validation in pointR1.ClearCofactor:** Not verifying the point's validity after cofactor clearing.
*   **Lack of point validation in pointR1.ScalarMult:** Assuming valid projected values and that the point is on the curve.

The authors reported these vulnerabilities to Cloudflare, who subsequently acknowledged and fixed them. The article emphasizes the importance of point validation before any computation to prevent these types of attacks and references the relevant IETF specifications and research papers.
chinese_title: Cloudflare Circl FourQ实现中的密码学问题 (CVE-2025-8556)
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了 Cloudflare CIRCL 库中发现的密码学漏洞 (CVE-2025-8556)，特别是其 FourQ 椭圆曲线的实现。这些漏洞主要集中在 Diffie-Hellman 密钥交换中使用的点验证不足，可能导致“无效点攻击”。

文章解释说，如果没有适当的验证，攻击者可以提供属于具有平滑子群阶的曲线的无效点。 这使得使用中国剩余定理更容易暴力破解服务器的密钥。 虽然 Edwards 曲线不易受到标准的无效曲线攻击，但可以通过使用 (0, y) 形式的点进行特定的退化曲线攻击。

报告的问题包括：

*   **Point.Unmarshal 中的不正确的点验证：** 未能在共轭 x 值后重新验证。
*   **pointR1.isEqual 中的错误点比较：** 当 Z 为零时返回 true，这是一个无效的投影坐标。
*   **pointR1.ClearCofactor 中缺少点验证：** 未在清除辅因子后验证点的有效性。
*   **pointR1.ScalarMult 中缺少点验证：** 假设有效的投影值并且该点在曲线上。

作者向 Cloudflare 报告了这些漏洞，随后 Cloudflare 承认并修复了这些漏洞。 文章强调了在任何计算之前进行点验证以防止此类攻击的重要性，并参考了相关的 IETF 规范和研究论文。

title: Die shots of as many CPUs and other interesting chips as possible
summary:
This Wikimedia Commons page is a project by Pauli Rautakorpi to collect and present die shots of a wide variety of CPUs and other integrated circuits. The page is organized by chip architecture and family, making it easy to browse the collection.

The collection features extensive coverage of x86 CPUs, starting from the 8086/8088 and continuing through the 5th generation (Pentium, K5, Cyrix 5x86/6x86), and includes various manufacturers like Intel, AMD, Cyrix, Texas Instruments, and others. It also includes die shots of FPUs compatible with these CPUs.

Beyond x86, the project covers a diverse range of CPUs and FPUs from different architectures, including AMD Am29k, Intel i860/i960, DEC PDP-11/VAX/Alpha, Hewlett-Packard PA-RISC, Motorola 680x/68k/88k/PowerPC, MIPS, SPARC, and ARM processors. Furthermore, it includes less common processors from manufacturers like AT&T, Bull, Data General, Fairchild, Inmos, Intergraph, Intersil, MOS Technology, National Semiconductor, nCUBE, RCA, Signetics, Tandem, Texas Instruments, TriMedia, Unisys, and Zilog.

The project also includes die shots of various support chips, such as graphics chips, video en/decoders, RAMDACs, cache controllers, memory controllers, memory management units, DMA controllers, bus and interface controllers, interrupt controllers, network controllers, memory chips, and crypto chips. It concludes with a section for unidentified or unknown chips. The author plans to continue adding die shots to the collection.
chinese_title: 尽可能多的CPU和其他有趣芯片的芯片照片
chinese_summary:
这个维基共享资源页面是由 Pauli Rautakorpi 发起的一个项目，旨在收集和展示各种 CPU 和其他集成电路的芯片照片。该页面按芯片架构和系列组织，方便浏览该合集。

该合集广泛涵盖了 x86 CPU，从 8086/8088 开始，一直到第五代（奔腾、K5、Cyrix 5x86/6x86），包括英特尔、AMD、Cyrix、德州仪器等各种制造商。它还包括与这些 CPU 兼容的 FPU 的芯片照片。

除了 x86 之外，该项目还涵盖了来自不同架构的各种 CPU 和 FPU，包括 AMD Am29k、英特尔 i860/i960、DEC PDP-11/VAX/Alpha、惠普 PA-RISC、摩托罗拉 680x/68k/88k/PowerPC、MIPS、SPARC 和 ARM 处理器。此外，它还包括来自 AT&T、Bull、Data General、Fairchild、Inmos、Intergraph、Intersil、MOS Technology、National Semiconductor、nCUBE、RCA、Signetics、Tandem、德州仪器、TriMedia、Unisys 和 Zilog 等制造商的不太常见的处理器。

该项目还包括各种支持芯片的芯片照片，例如图形芯片、视频编解码器、RAMDAC、缓存控制器、内存控制器、内存管理单元、DMA 控制器、总线和接口控制器、中断控制器、网络控制器、存储芯片和加密芯片。最后是一个用于未识别或未知芯片的部分。作者计划继续向该合集中添加芯片照片。

title: SourceFS: A 2h+ Android build becomes a 15m task with a virtual filesystem
summary:
Here's a summary of the "SourceFS: A 2h+ Android build becomes a 15m task with a virtual filesystem" article:

The article discusses SourceFS, a virtual filesystem developed by Sourcegraph to significantly reduce Android build times. Large Android builds, often taking hours, pose a major bottleneck for developer productivity. Traditional caching solutions are often ineffective due to subtle changes in dependencies and input files, leading to frequent cache misses.

SourceFS addresses this issue by providing a read-only, content-addressed filesystem that is populated by a remote build server. This means that the local machine only needs to download the specific files required for the current build, instead of the entire source code. Content addressing ensures that only changed files are transferred.

The key benefits of SourceFS are:

*   **Drastically reduced build times:** The article claims a reduction from over 2 hours to approximately 15 minutes for a large Android build.
*   **Improved developer productivity:** Faster builds allow for faster iteration cycles and more frequent testing.
*   **Reduced local resource usage:** Only necessary files are downloaded, minimizing disk space requirements and reducing I/O overhead.
*   **Consistency and reproducibility:** The content-addressed nature of SourceFS guarantees that the same source code always results in the same build artifacts.

In essence, SourceFS moves the heavy lifting of fetching and preparing the source code to a centralized server, allowing local development machines to focus on the actual build process with only the essential files. It represents a shift from "download everything and hope the cache works" to "download only what's needed."
chinese_title: SourceFS: 使用虚拟文件系统将 2 小时以上的 Android 构建缩短为 15 分钟的任务
chinese_summary:
以下是“SourceFS：通过虚拟文件系统，2小时以上的安卓构建缩短至15分钟”文章的摘要：

本文讨论了SourceFS，这是Sourcegraph开发的一种虚拟文件系统，旨在显著缩短Android构建时间。大型Android构建通常耗时数小时，对开发人员的生产力构成重大瓶颈。由于依赖项和输入文件的细微变化，传统的缓存解决方案通常效果不佳，导致频繁的缓存未命中。

SourceFS通过提供一个只读的、内容寻址的文件系统来解决这个问题，该文件系统由远程构建服务器填充。这意味着本地机器只需要下载当前构建所需的特定文件，而不是整个源代码。内容寻址确保只传输已更改的文件。

SourceFS的主要优点是：

*   **大幅缩短构建时间：** 文章声称，大型Android构建的时间从2小时以上缩短到大约15分钟。
*   **提高开发人员的生产力：** 更快的构建速度可以实现更快的迭代周期和更频繁的测试。
*   **降低本地资源使用率：** 只下载必要的文件，从而最大限度地减少磁盘空间需求并降低I/O开销。
*   **一致性和可重复性：** SourceFS的内容寻址特性保证了相同的源代码始终产生相同的构建产物。

本质上，SourceFS将获取和准备源代码的繁重工作转移到集中式服务器，使本地开发机器能够专注于实际的构建过程，只需必要的文件。它代表着从“下载所有内容并希望缓存有效”到“只下载所需内容”的转变。

title: The mild mannered Englishman who was the most prolific ghost hunter
summary:
Ben Machell's article introduces Tony Cornell, a seemingly ordinary Englishman who became one of the world's most prolific paranormal investigators. The article sets the stage with accounts of unsettling paranormal events: a grieving couple's encounter with a spectral child at a seance, a man tormented by an invisible "Black Dog," and a house inexplicably flooded with water.

The author describes his experience delving into Cornell's extensive archives at Cambridge University Library. He details the vast collection of reports, letters, photos, and notes Cornell accumulated over decades of investigating psychic phenomena. These materials include letters from ordinary people describing their experiences with ghosts, poltergeists, and other unexplainable events, alongside correspondence from academics and even Carl Jung.

The article highlights the central question driving Cornell's work: what happens when we die? He dedicated his life to exploring whether human consciousness can transcend physical mortality. The article suggests that Cornell offered a haven for ordinary people grappling with unexplained phenomena, providing a space to investigate claims when other forms of comfort and closure, like science or religion, fell short. Ultimately, the article positions Cornell as a key figure in parapsychology, leaving behind a significant archive that grapples with the enduring mysteries of life, death, and the paranormal.
chinese_title: 最温文尔雅且著作等身的英国捉鬼人
chinese_summary:
本·马歇尔的文章介绍了托尼·康奈尔，一位看似普通的英国人，却成为了世界上最多产的超自然现象调查员之一。文章以令人不安的超自然事件开场：一对悲伤的夫妇在降神会上遇到的幽灵孩子，一个被无形的“黑狗”折磨的男人，以及一间莫名其妙被水淹没的房子。

作者描述了他深入研究康奈尔在剑桥大学图书馆的浩瀚档案的经历。他详细介绍了康奈尔数十年调查超自然现象所积累的大量报告、信件、照片和笔记。这些材料包括普通人描述他们与鬼魂、骚灵现象和其他无法解释的事件的信件，以及来自学者甚至卡尔·荣格的信件。

文章强调了驱动康奈尔工作的核心问题：我们死后会发生什么？他毕生致力于探索人类意识是否能超越肉体的死亡。文章表明，康奈尔为那些努力应对无法解释的现象的普通人提供了一个避风港，提供了一个在其他形式的安慰和终结方式，如科学或宗教，失效时，调查这些声称的空间。最终，文章将康奈尔定位为超心理学领域的一个关键人物，留下了一份重要的档案，这份档案一直在探索关于生命、死亡和超自然现象的持久谜团。

title: Linux Capabilities Revisited
summary:
This article revisits Linux capabilities, a fine-grained access control mechanism that divides root privileges into distinct units. It highlights the importance of understanding and monitoring capabilities for security, as they offer a potentially stealthy way to escalate privileges compared to traditional SUID/SGID bits.

The article demonstrates how capabilities can be exploited. For example, granting the `cap_setuid` capability to Python allows a non-root user to spawn a root shell, essentially backdooring the system. The `setcap` command sets these capabilities on executables, while `getcap` helps enumerate files with capabilities. The author also included how to find those by inspecting `/proc` directory using `capsh --decode` and `getpcaps`. You can also remove the capabilities using `setcap -r` command.

The article emphasizes that security audits should include hunting for capabilities, alongside traditional SUID/SGID checks. It mentions tools like `getcap`, `getfattr`, and scripts like LinPEAS to aid in this process. The Elastic rule for detecting `setcap` utility usage is also referenced. Finally, the article encourages further exploration of user capabilities (stored in `/etc/security/capability.conf`) and AmbientCapabilities (specified in service files), and provides links to additional resources for in-depth learning.
chinese_title: Linux Capabilities 再探
chinese_summary:
本文重新探讨了Linux capabilities，一种细粒度的访问控制机制，它将root权限划分为不同的单元。文章强调了理解和监控capabilities对于安全性的重要性，因为与传统的SUID/SGID位相比，它们提供了一种潜在的隐蔽方式来提升权限。

文章演示了capabilities如何被利用。例如，授予Python `cap_setuid` capability允许非root用户生成root shell，本质上是在系统上留下后门。`setcap`命令在可执行文件上设置这些capabilities，而`getcap`有助于枚举具有capabilities的文件。作者还介绍了如何通过使用`capsh --decode`和`getpcaps`检查`/proc`目录来查找它们。您还可以使用`setcap -r`命令删除capabilities。

文章强调，安全审计应包括搜索capabilities，以及传统的SUID/SGID检查。文章提到了诸如`getcap`、`getfattr`之类的工具以及LinPEAS之类的脚本来帮助完成此过程。文章还引用了用于检测`setcap`实用程序使用的Elastic规则。最后，文章鼓励进一步探索用户capabilities（存储在`/etc/security/capability.conf`中）和AmbientCapabilities（在服务文件中指定），并提供了指向其他资源的链接，以进行深入学习。

title: French ex-president Sarkozy begins jail sentence
summary:
Nicolas Sarkozy, former French president, has begun serving a five-year jail sentence for conspiring to illegally fund his 2007 election campaign with money from Libya's Muammar Gaddafi. This marks the first time a French ex-president has been jailed since Philippe Pétain after World War II.

Sarkozy maintains his innocence and has filed an appeal. He's been placed in an isolation wing of La Santé prison for his safety, in a small cell equipped with basic amenities. While in isolation, he will have limited contact with other inmates and only one hour of daily exercise.

Prior to entering prison, Sarkozy expressed his feelings of injustice and sorrow for France, asserting his innocence and vowing the truth would prevail. His lawyer has also filed a request for his release. He was seen leaving his home with his wife, Carla Bruni-Sarkozy, amidst supporters.

The case has stirred considerable debate in France. President Macron acknowledged the shock and commentary the jailing of a former president would provoke, while emphasizing his non-interference in judicial decisions. Justice Minister Gérald Darmanin plans to visit Sarkozy in prison.

Sarkozy faces other legal challenges, including an upcoming verdict on an appeal against a six-month jail term in the Bygmalion affair, a separate illegal campaign financing case. He has previously been convicted of trying to bribe a magistrate.
chinese_title: 法国前总统萨科齐开始服刑
chinese_summary:
法国前总统尼古拉·萨科齐因涉嫌非法利用利比亚卡扎菲的资金资助其2007年竞选活动，已开始服刑五年。 这标志着自二战后菲利普·贝当以来，法国首位前总统入狱。

萨科齐坚称自己无罪并已提出上诉。为了他的安全，他已被安置在拉桑特监狱的隔离区，在一个配备基本设施的小牢房里。在隔离期间，他与其他囚犯的接触有限，每天只有一小时的锻炼时间。

在入狱之前，萨科齐表达了他对不公的感受和对法国的悲痛，坚称自己是无辜的，并誓言真相终将胜出。他的律师也提出了释放他的请求。人们看到他和妻子卡拉·布吕尼-萨科齐在支持者的簇拥下离开了家。

此案在法国引起了相当大的争议。 马克龙总统承认，一位前总统入狱会引发震惊和评论，同时强调他对司法判决不加干涉。司法部长热拉尔·达尔马宁计划前往监狱探望萨科齐。

萨科齐还面临其他法律挑战，包括即将对Bygmalion事件中针对六个月监禁判决的上诉做出裁决，这是一起独立的非法竞选资金案。他此前曾被判试图贿赂一名法官。

title: Patina: a Rust implementation of UEFI firmware
summary:
Patina is a Rust implementation of UEFI firmware aiming to replace core C-based UEFI components with memory-safe Rust code, enhancing system firmware security and stability while maintaining boot performance. Currently in beta, Patina encourages platform testing and feedback.

Key aspects include release processes, documentation available via a hosted site or self-hosting with `mdbook`, and instructions for setting up the Rust toolchain using `rustup` and installing essential tools like `cargo-make` and `cargo-llvm-cov`.

The project supports building for aarch64, x64, and native targets. It provides commands for running unit tests, building on-platform tests, and updating the Rust version, emphasizing careful evaluation and justification when changing the minimum supported Rust version. Coverage analysis and benchmarking are also supported.

The project roadmap focuses on Stabilization (bug fixes, performance improvements), Expansion (adding new components and MM Core support), and Ecosystem Integration (firmware and broader Rust community collaboration). Community contributions are welcomed.
chinese_title: Patina: UEFI固件的Rust实现
chinese_summary:
Patina 是一个用 Rust 语言实现的 UEFI 固件，旨在用内存安全的 Rust 代码替换基于 C 的核心 UEFI 组件，从而提高系统固件的安全性和稳定性，同时保持启动性能。目前处于 Beta 阶段，Patina 鼓励平台测试和反馈。

关键方面包括发布流程、可通过托管站点或使用 `mdbook` 自托管的文档，以及使用 `rustup` 设置 Rust 工具链并安装诸如 `cargo-make` 和 `cargo-llvm-cov` 等必要工具的说明。

该项目支持为 aarch64、x64 和原生目标构建。它提供运行单元测试、构建平台测试和更新 Rust 版本的命令，并强调在更改最低支持的 Rust 版本时要进行仔细评估和论证。该项目还支持覆盖率分析和基准测试。

项目路线图侧重于稳定化（错误修复、性能改进）、扩展（添加新组件和 MM Core 支持）以及生态系统集成（固件和更广泛的 Rust 社区协作）。 欢迎社区贡献。

title: Internet's biggest annoyance: Cookie laws should target browsers, not websites
summary:
This article argues that the current implementation of cookie consent laws, like GDPR and CCPA, is ineffective and overly annoying for internet users. The author criticizes the constant barrage of cookie banners on websites, leading to "consent fatigue" and an illusion of control. These laws unfairly burden small website owners with technical and legal complexities, while large corporations can navigate the system more easily.

The core proposal is a radical shift: moving cookie consent management from individual websites to web browsers. Instead of encountering a cookie banner on every site, users would set their privacy preferences once within their browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, etc.). The browser would then act as a personal privacy enforcer, automatically allowing or blocking cookies based on the user's defined settings.

This browser-centric approach offers several advantages: real user control through a single, thoughtful decision; a cleaner and faster web experience; a significant burden lifted from website owners, eliminating the need for clunky consent management platforms; and easier enforcement for regulators who can focus on browser developers rather than millions of websites. The author uses the failure of the "Do Not Track" signal as a cautionary tale, highlighting the need for browser-side enforcement to ensure compliance. The piece concludes by advocating for a simpler, more efficient system where browsers, not websites, manage cookie consent, creating a more user-friendly and privacy-respecting internet.
chinese_title: 互联网最大的烦恼：Cookie法应针对浏览器，而非网站
chinese_summary:
本文认为，当前 Cookie 同意法（如 GDPR 和 CCPA）的实施效果不佳，且对互联网用户过于烦扰。作者批评网站上不断出现的 Cookie 横幅广告，导致“同意疲劳”和控制幻觉。这些法律不公平地给小型网站所有者带来了技术和法律上的复杂性，而大型公司则可以更轻松地驾驭这一体系。

核心建议是一个根本性的转变：将 Cookie 同意管理从各个网站转移到网络浏览器。用户无需在每个网站上都遇到 Cookie 横幅广告，而只需在其浏览器（Chrome、Firefox、Safari 等）中设置一次隐私偏好。然后，浏览器将充当个人隐私执行者，根据用户定义的设置自动允许或阻止 Cookie。

这种以浏览器为中心的方法具有以下几个优点：通过一次深思熟虑的决定，实现真正的用户控制；更清洁、更快的网络体验；大大减轻网站所有者的负担，无需笨拙的同意管理平台；监管机构可以更轻松地进行执法，专注于浏览器开发商，而不是数百万个网站。作者以“请勿追踪”信号的失败为例，作为一个警示故事，强调了浏览器端执行以确保合规性的必要性。文章最后倡导一个更简单、更高效的系统，即由浏览器而非网站来管理 Cookie 同意，从而创建一个更用户友好和尊重隐私的互联网。

title: MinIO stops distributing free Docker images
summary: The issue reported that a new Docker image for a recent MinIO security release (Security/CVE RELEASE.2025-10-15T17-29-55Z) was missing from both quay.io and DockerHub. The reporter asked if this was expected and requested the push of a new release for Docker installation. The issue is labeled as "community" and "working as intended," suggesting that MinIO might have intentionally stopped distributing free Docker images or changed their distribution strategy.
chinese_title: MinIO 停止分发免费 Docker 镜像
chinese_summary: 报告指出，最近MinIO安全版本（Security/CVE RELEASE.2025-10-15T17-29-55Z）的Docker镜像在quay.io和DockerHub上均缺失。报告者询问这是否为预期行为，并请求推送用于Docker安装的新版本。该问题被标记为“社区”和“按预期工作”，暗示MinIO可能已故意停止分发免费Docker镜像或改变了其分发策略。

title: Go subtleties
summary:
This article highlights 15 subtle aspects of the Go programming language.

1.  **Ranging Over Integers:** Go 1.22 allows iterating directly over integers.
2.  **Renaming Packages:** Go's LSP can rename packages and update all references, including the directory.
3.  **Constraining Generic Function Signatures:** The `~` operator constrains generic type signatures to underlying types.
4.  **Index-Based String Interpolation:** `fmt.Printf` allows indexed string formatting for repeated values.
5.  **`time.After` Function:** Creates a channel that receives a message after a specified duration, useful for setting deadlines.
6.  **`embed` Package:** Embeds non-Go files directly into the Go binary.
7.  **`len()` with Strings:** Returns the number of bytes, not characters, requiring rune iteration for UTF-8 strings.
8.  **Nil Interfaces:** An interface can be non-nil even if the underlying value is nil due to "boxing".
9.  **Invoking Methods on Nil Values:** Methods can be called on nil structs, but accessing properties will panic.
10. **Variable References with Ranging over Maps:** Updates to a map inside a range loop are not guaranteed during the iteration.
11. **Returning Custom Errors:** Returning typed errors with structured data for debugging.
12. **Context-Aware Functions:** Select on both the context and the channel in context-aware functions to handle cancellations.
13. **Empty Structs:** Occupy zero bytes, commonly used for signaling on channels.
14. **Hidden Interface Satisfaction:** Struct embedding can cause unexpected behavior due to promoted methods.
15. **JSON "-" tag:** The "-" tag omits fields when marshaling to JSON.
16. **Comparing Times:** Timezone information is automatically appended to a string when converting from a Time struct, which means string comparisons wont work. Use the .Equal() method instead.
17. **The wg.Go function:** Added in go 1.25 and simplifies adding go routines to a wait group.
chinese_title: 围棋精妙
chinese_summary:
Go语言的15个微妙之处

1. 整数范围迭代：Go 1.22 允许直接迭代整数。
2. 重命名包：Go 的 LSP 可以重命名包并更新所有引用，包括目录。
3. 约束泛型函数签名：`~` 运算符将泛型类型签名约束为底层类型。
4. 基于索引的字符串插值：`fmt.Printf` 允许索引字符串格式化以重复值。
5. `time.After` 函数：创建一个通道，在指定持续时间后接收消息，可用于设置截止时间。
6. `embed` 包：将非 Go 文件直接嵌入到 Go 二进制文件中。
7. `len()` 处理字符串：返回字节数，而不是字符数，需要 rune 迭代处理 UTF-8 字符串。
8. Nil 接口：即使底层值为 nil，接口也可能为非 nil，因为存在“装箱”。
9. 在 Nil 值上调用方法：可以在 nil 结构体上调用方法，但访问属性将引发 panic。
10. 范围迭代 Map 中的变量引用：在范围循环中更新 map 不能保证在迭代期间生效。
11. 返回自定义错误：返回带有结构化数据的类型化错误以进行调试。
12. 上下文感知函数：在上下文感知函数中同时 select 上下文和通道，以处理取消。
13. 空结构体：占用零字节，通常用于通道上的信号传递。
14. 隐藏的接口满足：由于提升的方法，结构体嵌入可能会导致意外行为。
15. JSON "-" 标签："-" 标签在序列化为 JSON 时会忽略字段。
16. 时间比较：从 Time 结构转换时，时区信息会自动附加到字符串，这意味着字符串比较不起作用。请改用 .Equal() 方法。
17. wg.Go 函数：在 go 1.25 中添加，简化了向等待组添加 go 协程的操作。

title: OpenAI's New Browser Raises 'Insurmountably High' Security Concerns
summary:
OpenAI's new ChatGPT Atlas browser, a Chromium-based browser with an integrated chatbot, is raising significant security and privacy concerns. While designed to enhance web navigation through a conversational interface and features like "Memories" (which stores contextual information about visited sites), the browser's default data collection is alarming experts.

The browser saves details about user interactions and preferences, excluding certain sensitive information like personal IDs, but this relies on the system working as intended. The built-in AI agent, designed to browse and complete tasks, is particularly vulnerable. Security researchers have demonstrated how prompt injection attacks can hijack such agents, potentially exposing login credentials and authentication codes.

Programmer Simon Willison highlights the lack of clear defenses against prompt injection and the high-stakes privacy and security risks associated with AI agents in browsers. A hacker has already demonstrated a "clipboard injection" vulnerability, leading users to phishing sites. Experts warn of potentially significant privacy and security holes, while Atlas simultaneously collects extensive user data for personalization. This combination of vulnerabilities and data collection creates a sophisticated surveillance system, potentially leading to disastrous consequences for user privacy and security.
chinese_title: OpenAI新浏览器引发“难以逾越”的安全担忧
chinese_summary:
OpenAI新款ChatGPT Atlas浏览器，一款集成聊天机器人的Chromium内核浏览器，引发了重大的安全和隐私担忧。虽然它旨在通过对话式界面和“记忆”（存储访问网站的上下文信息）等功能来增强网络导航，但该浏览器默认的数据收集令专家感到震惊。

该浏览器会保存用户互动和偏好的详细信息，排除个人身份证明等某些敏感信息，但这依赖于系统按预期工作。内置的AI代理，旨在浏览和完成任务，尤其容易受到攻击。安全研究人员已经演示了提示注入攻击如何劫持此类代理，从而可能暴露登录凭据和身份验证码。

程序员Simon Willison强调了缺乏针对提示注入的明确防御措施，以及浏览器中AI代理相关的高风险隐私和安全风险。一名黑客已经演示了一种“剪贴板注入”漏洞，导致用户访问钓鱼网站。专家警告说，存在潜在的重大隐私和安全漏洞，而Atlas同时收集大量的用户数据用于个性化。这种漏洞和数据收集的结合，创造了一个复杂的监控系统，可能导致对用户隐私和安全的灾难性后果。

title: VortexNet: Neural network based on fluid dynamics
summary:
The "VortexNet: Neural Computing through Fluid Dynamics" project introduces a novel neural network architecture inspired by fluid dynamics, specifically vortex behavior. The repository provides toy implementations to illustrate how PDE-based vortex layers and fluid-inspired mechanisms can be integrated into neural networks, with a focus on autoencoders.

The project includes two main scripts: `vortexnet_mnist.py`, which demonstrates a VortexNet autoencoder trained on the MNIST dataset, and `vortexnext_image.py`, an advanced version for custom image datasets featuring data augmentation and latent space interpolation. These scripts are intended as educational prototypes rather than fully optimized solvers.

To use the code, users need to clone the repository, install Python dependencies (torch, torchvision, matplotlib, pyyaml, scikit-learn, seaborn, tensorboard), and prepare the data. MNIST is automatically downloaded. For custom images, users should place them in the `my_data/` directory. The scripts can be run using Python 3.11, with `vortexnext_image.py` requiring a configuration file (`config_image.yaml`).

The project emphasizes that the scripts are toy prototypes for educational purposes. Output, logs, reconstructed images, and model checkpoints are saved in a user-specified output directory, and TensorBoard can be used to monitor training progress. The configuration file is crucial for proper setup before running the advanced script.
